Zhengchao Wan

About me

Welcome to my personal website. I am currently a 5th year PhD Candidate in Mathematics at the Ohio State University. My advisor is Facundo Mémoli. I earned my Bachelor's degree in Mathematics at Peking University in 2016.

Here is my current CV.

Research Interests

Metric geometry, optimal transport, spectral geometry, topological data analysis

Check out my recent papers!

  • Characterization of Gromov-type geodesics (With Facundo Mémoli.) arXiv preprint arXiv:2105.05369 (2021).

  • The ultrametric Gromov-Wasserstein distance (With Facundo Mémoli, Axel Munk, Christoph Weitcamp.) arXiv preprint arXiv:2101.05756 (2021).

  • Persistent Laplacians: properties, algorithms and implications (With Facundo Mémoli, Yusu Wang.) arXiv preprint arXiv:2012.02808 (2020).
